articles.description: India defeated England by 88 runs in the second ODI to claim victory in the three-match series, with the captain Harmanpreet Kaur smashing 143 not out before Renuka Singh Thakur took 4-57
articles.content: On Wednesday morning, the ECB announced an ambitious 2023 Womens Ashes fixture list, which includes maiden visits to Lords, the Oval and Edgbaston; and a five-day Test at Trent Bridge. It is a schedu… [+4274 chars]

articles.title: Doomed plane carrying footballer Emiliano Sala was 'dodgy', pilot said - BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: The pilot of Emiliano Sala's plane told friends the aircraft was "dodgy" before the flight that killed the Argentine footballer.Pilot David Ibbotson is heard...
